text:
Glen, I have detected a regression caused by the implementation of space-
before/space-after in BLM and (I think) the use of a static vrbl to hold the 
space-after value.

The attached testcase show how the same input .fo document rendered the same 
way two times, result in two different output files.

The issue only occurs when rendering two or more documents in the same run.
creator: bckfnn@worldonline.dk
